alert.note: Alert for Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 9:25AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Nuckolls and east central Webster Counties through 1015 AM CDT... At 924 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Nelson to near Guide Rock. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Nelson around 930 AM CDT. Nora around 935 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 PM CDT for south central Nebraska.
